talk.msg: Agent 74, this is headquarters, emergency
Destroy all zombies! &&[Head] is the zombie's weak point! Good luck!
Make good use of the [pre-war benefits], and your weapons will be greatly enhanced
Damn it! Zombies mutate, and large bosses strike
Agent 74, mission objective [kill the BOSS]!
HQ sent me to help you + investigate the zombie incident
Don't just stare at me, just shoot! Boy!
What... Zombies are driving? ?
I thought you were the only one who could drive, && anyway [destroy that car]!
This zombie is really hard to fight, you can't die with a few shots!
It should be a new zombie, with different clothes...
Oh ~ no! Dear~ Lighten up!
Don't just add me to your lustful dreams! Wake up! Zombies are coming!
I won't give you canned meat if I find it, go to hell!
I found a room nearby
/// - /// I didn't expect you to be so active...ah! why hit me...
You have performed well against zombies recently, and I am going to raise your rank!
How about some more beer?
Ah! Roar! Hohohoho!
They were barking! fire!
There is a new task
Can I get more money or diamonds by completing tasks? ...don't despise me
Young people, upgrade your guns more
If I get paid a little more, I can...
This zombie isn't dead yet, let's make up a few more shots
I'm happy with you at night, but with zombies...
Sorry, I don't understand zombie language
Gold coins are not enough, you can wait for the income or use diamonds to buy guns
Use resurrection and blood volume to survive!
With pre-war benefits, you can shoot faster and more
The distribution of military supplies is very costly, so use advertising videos to support it!
We need more powerful weapons! && Combine [same level] guns into higher level guns!
Beauty, who are you? && How about we leave a WeChat/QQ to each other and you can teach me more?
